title: Normalize Audio
description: Optimize audio levels for consistent loudness

sections.title: About Audio Normalization
content: Audio normalization adjusts the overall level of audio to achieve consistent loudness standards, making your audio sound professional and broadcast-ready.

sections.title: Normalization Formula
content: Maintains relative dynamics while adjusting overall level

sections.title: What Normalization Does
content: Adjusts peak levels to optimal ranges

sections.title: When to Normalize
content: To match levels in audio compilations

sections.title: Loudness Standards
content: Streaming: -14 LUFS for Spotify, Apple Music
Broadcast: -23 LUFS for TV, -16 LUFS for radio
